content: helen s mittens mawdsleyfibrearts materials  50gm/120m/132 yds of dk yarn sample here used new lanark wool autumn colourway o approx 35 gm for small size o approx 40 gm for medium size o approx 45 gm for large size  3 25mm needles us size 3  4mm needles us size 6  stitch marker stitch holder tapestry needle sizing the pattern instructions are written for small medium large which could also be described as older child average adult larger adult gauge 22 sts = 10cm/4in in stockinette pattern notes i developed this pattern many many years ago when i taught knitting at a local yarn store so that i could offer my students a free mitten pattern while attending my class in this version i have expanded some of the instructions and offered pictures while this is not a replacement for in-person instruction i hope that it can help you as you work through this pattern i am re-releasing this pattern at the end of 2020 as a free pattern for all it seems folks have started to become curious about exploring arts and crafts and developing their personal skills in these areas and i hope that this pattern adds to that momentum in addition i would like to encourage using this pattern for making donation and charity mittens the mitten is knit from the cuff to the top with an ambidextrous thumb placement rather than a specific left or right thumb placement © 2020 them to left-hand needle one at a time in their new orientation knit them together through back loops 1 stitch decreased pm place marker sm slip marker k1p1 knit1 purl 1 often worked as a rib pattern where the k1p1 is repeated for the round columns should appear if columns are not appearing check stitch count and that the beginning of round is consistent from round to round k1fb knit into front loop and back loop of same stitch 1 stitch increased directions cuff with smaller needles cast on 24 32 40 stitches tip distribute the stitches in an even number on each needle then as you complete the ribbing in the next section you can start each needle with a knit and end with a purl this may help reduce errors join and work in k1p1 rib for 3 3 5 4 inches © 2020 mawdsleyfibrearts change to
